entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having a rasping bark of a voice and being able to smell blood coming from Fenrir Greyback.

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: A Death Eater with black robes, described as having matted grey hair and whiskers, and a rasping bark of a voice. He is also described as having long yellowish nails and licking his lips slowly.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who is talking to Fenrir Greyback, described as being shocked by Greyback's behavior.

relationships.description: Fenrir Greyback is attacking Harry Potter.
Dumbledore is interacting with Fenrir Greyback, expressing his shock and concern about Greyback's behavior.
